meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>One</kanji> <kanji>hit</kanji> is simply… <vocabulary>one hit</vocabulary>!

一打 refers to a single impactful strike. It's often a hit in ball sports, but can also be a punch in boxing or a button tap in video games.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
